reviewText: This is one of the best documentaries that I have seen about the lives of America’s elite Military Working Dogs!  “Always Faithful” highlights the incredible bond that exists between courageous Military Working Dogs and their devoted handlers.  The film takes viewers on an unprecedented journey and offers a rare, never-before seen glimpse inside the world of the United States Military’s renowned K-9 teams: from the grueling handler selection process, to a relentless training regimen at Lackland Air Force in San Antonio, where handlers and their dogs begin to build a rock solid foundation that will lead to an indescribable bond that will save lives in combat, to Pre-Deployment training at Yuma Proving Ground in Arizona.  These brave defenders of Freedom will be ready to meet any challenge that fate throws at them on the battlefield.This documentary also showcases personal interviews with the handlers themselves, who offer in-depth first-hand accounts of their experiences serving in Iraq and Afghanistan with their canine partners in arms.  Among them, is Marine Corps Military Working Dog handler Mike Dowling who is the author of the book “Sergeant Rex”, which chronicles his real-life experience during the Iraq conflict in 2004.  Interviews and footage from the frontlines puts you right in the middle of the action.  You can’t help but have a heightened appreciation for these valiant handlers and their noble dogs that have both endured and sacrificed more than anyone can begin to imagine on the field of battle.  “Always Faithful” delivers an unbiased approach examining the lives of America’s silent heroes.  However, unlike its predecessor “War Dogs of the Pacific” this is certainly a much more thorough and personal portrait of what it truly means to work with Military Working Dogs.  I highly recommend this documentary.
summary: A Great Documentary that Honors brave Dogs of War and their Handlers!

reviewText: What a nice documentary on a subject so worth while paying attention to. It shines light on the use of canines as therapy animals. It is a good view of the troubles our service members face post deployment and how easy they can be even somewhat lifted from out of darkness with the simple love of a canine.
summary: This will bring tears to your eyes if you are a dog lover

reviewText: People don't realize just how Man's (huMAN) best friend just wants to please another but more heart wrenching is the Glory Hounds show.  Where you see just how dangerous it is for the dog and his handler, they are always on point.  I would like to see more of these and as a veteran 100% disabled I am hoping to adopt an MWD soon.
summary: As lover of the only animal named after GOD this is a great movie

reviewText: Always Faithful takes the viewer from the training ground into Combat, smoothly, the Combat K-9's are truly one of our greatest weapons in the fight against terrorists in the middle east, and in the United States whether it be Military Dogs protecting bases, or Top Secret facilities.Most non Military/non dog people have no idea how many uses there exists now in our country for trained dogs, beside hunting and herding, the Military uses dogs as sentry, patrol, narcotics, and a multitude of other uses, as does law enforcement.I think this is a good production, and I recommend it to any viewers.
